# Code examples

### create a BusinessIntent Worker

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";


ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    const Maker = ServisBotApiSdk.Maker;
    
    const myResponseVoice = new Maker.ResponseVoice.GenericAdvisorResponse();
    const myPromptStrategy = new Maker.PromptStrategy.FlowStrategy();
    const contextMapping = { a : 1 };

    const apiBusinessTx = new Maker.API('http://servisbot.com/api', { });

    const myBusinessIntent = new Maker.BusinessIntent(apiBusinessTx, []);
    const orchestrator = new Maker.Orchestrator(myBusinessIntent, myResponseVoice, myPromptStrategy, contextMapping);
    
    const botId = "<Bot ID>";
    return Maker.save( botId, orchestrator );
  })
  .then((result) => {
    console.log(result);
  });
```
